SKN-R.BK.summary: S.Kijchai Enterprise Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes wood substitute products with medium density fiber boards in Thailand. The company's products include furniture, flooring, and interior products, as well as doors. It also offers glue, chemical, rubber, sawmill, and plywood products, as well as fuel briquettes. The company was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Rayong, Thailand. S.Kijchai Enterprise Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of S.Kijchai Capital Co.,Ltd.

The company was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Rayong, Thailand. S.Kijchai Enterprise Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of S.Kijchai Capital Co.,Ltd.

VNG-R.BK.summary: Vanachai Group Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, produces and distributes wood plates, MDF boards, particle boards, and doorskin and melamine on wood plates in Thailand and internationally. The company's products include laminated flooring, laminated particleboards, and laminated veneer. It also manufactures glue and melamine impregnated paper products, and resin, as well as veneer on MDF boards; and generates electricity from biomass. The company was formerly known as MDF Planner Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Vanachai Group Public Company Limited. The company was founded in 1943 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand. Vanachai Group Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Vanachai Group of Companies Co., Ltd.
